author: olegk
msg: * SimpleRequest and SimpleResponse classes factored out
* Interface HttpService can be used instead of HttpRequestHandler to implement test cases in a way very similar to writing servlets.
* Basic authentication test cases ported to the new testing framework

author: olegk
msg: * Base class for test cases using org.apache.commons.httpclient.server.SimpleHttpServer based framework
* org.apache.commons.httpclient.server.auth package for authentication test cases
